    Cineworld Brighton Change cinema

    About Brighton

    Cineworld Brighton is an 8-screen cinema located within Brighton Marina on the seafront. The complex is served by a free car park and a wide range of restaurants in short proximity.

    • Summary of facilities
    • How much do tickets cost?
    • How do I get there?
    • Hire this cinema

    What's on at Brighton

    • Tickets Selling Fast
      Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
    • How To Train Your Dragon 2

    See all films at this cinema

    Bargain Tuesday Any film, every Tuesday, bargain price N/A N/A N/A N/A
    Movies for Juniors Parent and child screenings, price is specific to Movies for Juniors shows only £1.35 N/A £1.50 N/A
    Movies for Juniors 3D Parent and child screenings, price is specific to Movies for Juniors shows only £2.70 N/A £3.00 N/A
    *Please note:
    • Weekend pricing applies on Bank Holidays.
    • A fee of 50p per person applies to tickets booked online or by phone. This 50p fee represents a charge for booking remotely and includes an amount payable to Classic Cinemas Limited for processing online/telephone payments and redemptions. If you do not wish to pay this fee you can purchase your tickets in person at the cinema. Click for T&Cs.
    • 50p fee not applicable to Unlimited, Movies for Juniors, CEA carer ticket and some promotional tickets, until further notice.
    • Where the 50p fee applies, it will be included in the ticket price during the booking process.
    • Mycineworld ticket prices displayed above include the 50p fee and mycineworld discount, each where applicable. In-Cinema prices shown do not include 50p fee as this fee does not apply to tickets purchased in person at the cinema.
    • The cost of certain performances such as live events, theatre, opera etc may vary. Please check your booking carefully before payment is made.

    How do I get there?

    Details

    1
    Cineworld Brighton
    Brighton Marina, Brighton, East Sussex BN2 5UF
    0871 200 2000

    Transport Information

    By train

    Brighton Railway Station is approx 2 miles away from the cinema. Bus 7 runs every 15 mins from the train station to the Marina at peak times

    By bus

    Numbers 7, 21 and 23 stop outside the cinema.

    By car

    Head down A23 to seafront, turn left and follow tourist signs to Brighton Marina. The cinema is 1 mile east of Brighton Pier.

    Parking

    Free multi storey car park is available nearby the cinema.

    Disabled Access

    Disabled Parking

    Designated spaces for disabled parking are available on the lowest floor near the Asda garage

    Hire Cineworld Brighton

    Cineworld Brighton's experienced events team can provide a variety of additional audio, visual and lighting to suit all your requirements, and with flexible space at the front of our auditoria we can accommodate a variety of different staging setups.

    Our professional caterers can provide anything from pastries on arrival to a full hot buffet, and we can offer fantastic corporate deals on refreshments.

    Visit our venue hire website
